original_title: Dark Funeral - We Are the Apocalypse Album Release Livestream
overview: Live & Streaming Event / April 16, 2022  In celebration of the release of the 7th full-length album "We Are The Apocalypse" on March 18, Dark Funeral to perform a special album release show in on April 16 the following date of the album release date, with special guests Samael and Eleine.
title: Dark Funeral - We Are the Apocalypse Album Release Livestream
